com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model

Class FrostAttack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack
      • com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.FrostAttack

  • public class FrostAttack
extends Attack
    This class represents a Frost attack that a character generates. It is a subclass of the Attack class
    Since:
    javac 1.8.0_271
    Author:
    Daniel Pereira Castillo Student number: 041009960 Lab Section 302
    See Also:
    Attack
